files.description: Setup script for the Quran search application. Uses setuptools to configure package details, version, packages, and installation requirements.
List of package requirements for the Quran search application. Currently empty, serving as a placeholder for future dependencies.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.name: load_quran_data
functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Provides functions for searching words, phrases, counting occurrences, and calculating gematrical (Abjad) values from Quran data based on the standard Abjad numeral mapping.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a word in the provided Quran data, returning verses that contain the search word. The search can be case-sensitive or case-insensitive.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the Quran verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to determine if the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. It returns verses where the exact phrase is found.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Whether the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data. Returns verses that contain the word.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number within which to search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group within a given Surah of the Quran and returns verses that contain the phrase.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if the search should be case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of occurrences of a given word in the entire Quran data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences are to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data without overlapping occurrences.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to count occurrences of.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran data, with an option for case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple representing the starting verse (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Tuple representing the ending verse (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to determine if the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word group within a specified verse range in the Quran data, using either case-sensitive or case-insensitive comparison.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple representing the start verse (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: Tuple representing the end verse (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if the search should be case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Searches for Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words a verse must contain to be returned.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Searches for Quran verses where the word count is an exact multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if the multiplier is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple used to filter verses; must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic word or phrase by summing the numerical values of its letters based on a predefined mapping.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Arabic word or phrase for which to calculate the gematrical value.

functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations including word and phrase searches, range searches, and gematrical value calculations. Outputs results to the console.
